page.title: 13Halfway childhood 1985
page.content: {A survey of Halfway children aged 8-12 {Possessions: Bicycles......80% Pets..........80% Computers.....70% {In the home:} A telephone...90% 2 telephones..25% 3 telephones...5% A television.100% 2 televisions.50% 3 televisions.15% 4 televisions.15% Video recorder45% Car...........75% 2 cars........10% 3 cars........10% {Experience: Can swim 25 metres................85% Have been on a train..............90% Belong to cubs, brownies etc......30% Regular churchgoers...............15% Have been abroad..................55% Regularly go into Sheffield alone.25% Sometimes go into Sheffield alone.20% Never go into Sheffield alone.....55%
